normal.name: Love Fist (爱神之拳)

ultimate.name: Love and Beauty Waltz (爱与美之圆舞曲)
ultimate.description: Normal Ultimate: Deals 1800% attack power as holy damage to designated enemy. Enhanced Ultimate (after 10 normal attacks): Deals 2160% attack power as holy damage to designated enemy, recovers 2 energy at the end, Counts as a basic-attack hit for any on-hit or combo effects.
